entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
